vlive.korean: 모르시죠? - 광산 김씨인가요? You don't know? - Kim from Kwangsan? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : [Full] 'IDOL RADIO' ep#4. 우리의 자정은 낮보다 뜨겁다 with 세븐틴
vlive.english: You don't know? - Kim from Kwangsan?

vlive.korean: 광산 김 씨입니다. - 광산 김! - 광산 김 씨. I am a Gwangsan Kim. - Gwangsan Kim - Gwangsan Kim. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2018 - EP.39
vlive.english: I am a Gwangsan Kim. - Gwangsan Kim - Gwangsan Kim.

vlive.korean: 이거 무슨 맵이야? 광산! OK, 광산. Which map is this? The mine. Okay, the mine. 듣기 View video IMFACT : [JEUP] 제업이와 카트라이더 하실 분!!!♥.♥
vlive.english: Which map is this? The mine. Okay, the mine.

vlive.korean: [불안] - 밸런스가 좋지 않은데? - 광산 김? [Nervous] - I have a bad feeling about this balance. - Are you a Gwangsan Kim? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2018 - EP.39
vlive.english: [Nervous] - I have a bad feeling about this balance. - Are you a Gwangsan Kim?

vlive.korean: [게임 이야기에 들뜬 뷔] - 난 게임 못해서. - 전화하면 나 지금 광산이야라고 하면서... [Excited by game talks] - Because I don't play games. - We used to say we were at a mine if someone called us while gaming. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2017 - EP.25
vlive.english: [Excited by game talks] - Because I don't play games. - We used to say we were at a mine if someone called us while gaming.
